channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - _429
item.description: Message ERB429I Map: SMF74A Based on: dms Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dms.

item.title: Field - agc
item.description: The Alias Management Group number defined on the physical controller for this device. Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74AGC Description This number is valid if the device belongs to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 1 of SMF74CN2 is set

item.title: Field - ags
item.description: The Alias Management Group number assigend by z/OS for this device on this system. Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74AGS Description This number is valid if the device belongs to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 1 of SMF74CN2 is set

item.title: Field - alc
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS ALLOCATED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74ALC

item.title: Field - atd
item.description: Number of times I/Os were subjected to imposed delays due to PAV alias throttling Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74ATD

item.title: Field - atv
item.description: DEVICE ACTIVE TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74ATV

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cap
item.description: DASD volume capacity (in cylinders) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CAP

item.title: Field - cfc
item.description: =1 Device connected to Ficon Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - cfl
item.description: Configuration Change Flags Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74CFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description dca 0 Configuration Changed this interval. iac 1 Configuration Changed since last IPL iod 2 System IPLed via IODF icv 3 I/O Configuration Token is valid.

item.title: Field - clf
item.description: Flags for each device class Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CLF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rnr 0 Flag number option active rsg 1 Flag SG option active rcs 2 Flag for SG name changed during the interval mts 3 Open mount at interval start mte 4 Open mount at interval end clw 6 CTC with special protocol

item.title: Field - clw
item.description: CTC with special protocol Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field clf.

item.title: Field - cmb
item.description: =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - cmr
item.description: Initial command response time in units of 128 microseconds Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CMR

item.title: Field - cn2
item.description: Device Flag Extension 2 Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CN2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description hwr 0 =1 HyperWrite requested xpv 1 =1 Device in SuperPAV mode sir 2 =1 Device is capable of synch I/O read requests siw 3 =1 Device is capable of synch I/O write requests

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnf
item.description: DEVICE FLAGS Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CNF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lcd 1 =1 IF NO LCU DATA cmb 2 =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID del_ 3 =1 Device has been deleted par 4 =1 ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS AVAILABLE vac 6 DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION sta 7 =1 at interval end online or offline devices indicated to be monitored

item.title: Field - cni
item.description: =1 If device connect time is invalid Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - cnn
item.description: DEVICE CONNECT TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CNN

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cnx
item.description: Device Flag Extension see also SMF74CNF above Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CNX Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description dyc 0 Device Dynamically Changed ddt 1 =1 If device disconnect time is invalid pav 2 =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume nxc 3 =1 If number of alias exposures changed ntf 4 Timing facility not active cni 5 =1 If device connect time is invalid hpv 6 =1 If HyperPAV base device cfc 7 =1 Device connected to Ficon

item.title: Field - cof
item.description: NUMBER OF REQUESTS THAT HAD CONNECT TIME OVERFLOW Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74COF

item.title: Field - cu
item.description: Control unit name Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CU

item.title: Field - cuq
item.description: Control Unit Queuing Time Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CUQ

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - dca
item.description: Configuration Changed this interval. Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - dcf
item.description: Flags for DASD class Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74DCF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description nrf 0 Flag to cause two report areas sgf 1 Flag to cause sort by SG

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DEVICE CNTL SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DCL

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE CNTL SECTIONS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DEVICE CNTL SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DCS

item.title: Field - dct
item.description: Configuration Token for self-describing devices valid if SMF74SND = 0 Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DCT

item.title: Field - ddl
item.description: LENGTH OF DEVICE DATA SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DDL

item.title: Field - ddn
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DDN

item.title: Field - dds
item.description: OFFSET TO DEVICE DATA SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DDS

item.title: Field - ddt
item.description: =1 If device disconnect time is invalid Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - del_
item.description: =1 Device has been deleted Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - dev
item.description: Device name Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DEV

item.title: Field - dis
item.description: DEVICE DISCONNECT TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DIS

item.title: Field - dms
item.description: Message flags Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74DMS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description _429 0 Message ERB429I sme 1 SMS Interface Error

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dso
item.description: Not longer needed, new field is SMF74NDA, variable name is needed for conversion Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DSO

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - dts
item.description: indentify source of Token Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DTS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description srd 0 if set: self desc. snd 1 if set: no self desc. shv 3 ON = SMF74SHR indication is valid shr 4 ON = device is shared/assigned to multiple systems

item.title: Field - dvb
item.description: device busy delay time Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DVB

item.title: Field - dyc
item.description: Device Dynamically Changed Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - ecm
item.description: On = extended CMB Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field enf.

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - enf
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74ENF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ecm 0 On = extended CMB sts 1 On = model dependent data not available by STSCH fcm 2 On = initial command response time valid (SMF74CMR) fid 3 On = interrupt delay time valid (SMF74IDT)

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fcm
item.description: On = initial command response time valid (SMF74CMR) Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field enf.

item.title: Field - fid
item.description: On = interrupt delay time valid (SMF74IDT) Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field enf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gen
item.description: TOTAL NUMBER OF DEVICES SYSGENED FOR ALL CLASSES Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74GEN

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE

item.title: Field - hpc
item.description: Number of HyperPAV aliases configured for that LSS Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74HPC

item.title: Field - hpv
item.description: =1 If HyperPAV base device Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - hwr
item.description: =1 HyperWrite requested Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cn2.

item.title: Field - iac
item.description: Configuration Changed since last IPL Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - icv
item.description: I/O Configuration Token is valid. Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - idt
item.description: Interrupt delay time in units of microseconds. Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74IDT Description This field is zero if not supported by the hardware.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT

item.title: Field - iod
item.description: System IPLed via IODF Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - ios
item.description: IOS Queue time in microseconds (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74IOS

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST

item.title: Field - lcd
item.description: =1 IF NO LCU DATA Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - lcu
item.description: LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT NUMBER Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74LCU

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO

item.title: Field - lsn
item.description: Logical SMF record sequence number for device class Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74LSN

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mct
item.description: Maximum number of allocated tape devices Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74MCT

item.title: Field - mec
item.description: MEASUREMENT EVENT COUNT (NUMBER OF SSCH FOR WHICH CONNECT, PENDING, AND ACTIVE TIME WERE STORED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74MEC

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV

item.title: Field - msm
item.description: On = There are more logical SMF records in device class Map: SMF74A Based on: smf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field smf.

item.title: Field - mtc
item.description: Number of mount conditions Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74MTC

item.title: Field - mte
item.description: Open mount at interval end Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field clf.

item.title: Field - mtp
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED A MOUNT PENDING CONDITION Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74MTP

item.title: Field - mts
item.description: Open mount at interval start Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field clf.

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS

item.title: Field - nda
item.description: Total number of allocations in effect for the device Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NDA

item.title: Field - ndn
item.description: 4-byte device number in EBCDIC format, if SMF74SND = 1 Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NDN

item.title: Field - nm2
item.description: Device number same as SMF74NUM Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NM2

item.title: Field - nrd
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS NOT READY Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NRD

item.title: Field - nrf
item.description: Flag to cause two report areas Map: SMF74A Based on: dcf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dcf.

item.title: Field - nss
item.description: Number of skipped samples caused by too large delta values Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NSS

item.title: Field - ntf
item.description: Timing facility not active Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - num
item.description: DEVICE NUMBER Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NUM

item.title: Field - nux
item.description: Number of exposures, if multiple exposure device. Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NUX Description In case of HyperPAV base device, SMF74HPV = 1, number of accumulated HyperPAV aliases

item.title: Field - nxc
item.description: =1 If number of alias exposures changed Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - nxt
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS IN FOLLOWING BROKEN RECORDS FOR THIS LOGICAL DEVICE CLASS RECORD Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74NXT

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - par
item.description: =1 ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS AVAILABLE Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - pav
item.description: =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - pct
item.description: Number of unsuccessful PAV samples Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74PCT

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - pen
item.description: DEVICE PENDING TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74PEN

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74PRS

item.title: Field - psm
item.description: Number of successful PAV samples Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74PSM

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - que
item.description: NUMBER OF REQUESTS QUEUED IN IOS FOR THIS DEVICE Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74QUE

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcs
item.description: Flag for SG name changed during the interval Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field clf.

item.title: Field - rnr
item.description: Flag number option active Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field clf.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rsg
item.description: Flag SG option active Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field clf.

item.title: Field - rsv
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74RSV

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74RTY

item.title: Field - s15
item.description: Reg 15 after SMS interface call (SSI RC) Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74S15

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM

item.title: Field - sbr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read bytes transferred (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SBR

item.title: Field - sbw
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write bytes transferred (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SBW

item.title: Field - scmr
item.description: Number of cache miss conditions for synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SCMR

item.title: Field - scs
item.description: Subchannel Set the device is situated Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SCS

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74SEG

item.title: Field - ser
item.description: VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER OF MOUNTED VOLUME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SER

item.title: Field - sftr
item.description: Elapsed (fail) time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for unsuccessful synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SFTR

item.title: Field - sftw
item.description: Elapsed (fail) time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for unsuccessful synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SFTW

item.title: Field - sgf
item.description: Flag to cause sort by SG Map: SMF74A Based on: dcf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dcf.

item.title: Field - sgn
item.description: Storage Group Name Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SGN

item.title: Field - shr
item.description: ON = device is shared/assigned to multiple systems Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field dts.

item.title: Field - shv
item.description: ON = SMF74SHR indication is valid Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field dts.

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74SID

item.title: Field - sir
item.description: =1 Device is capable of synch I/O read requests Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cn2.

item.title: Field - siw
item.description: =1 Device is capable of synch I/O write requests Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cn2.

item.title: Field - slbr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read link busy conditions (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SLBR

item.title: Field - slbw
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write link busy conditions (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SLBW

item.title: Field - sme
item.description: SMS Interface Error Map: SMF74A Based on: dms Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dms.

item.title: Field - smf
item.description: Logical SMF record flag Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SMF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description msm 0 On = There are more logical SMF records in device class

item.title: Field - snd
item.description: if set: no self desc. Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Description device 4-byte device number stored Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dts.

item.title: Field - snis
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write requests where the write data could not be immediately stored (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SNIS

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM

item.title: Field - sor
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read requests rejected for other reasons (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SOR

item.title: Field - sow
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write requests rejected for other reasons (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SOW

item.title: Field - spr
item.description: Processing time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for successful synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SPR

item.title: Field - spw
item.description: Processing time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for successful synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SPW

item.title: Field - sqr
item.description: Number of successfully completed synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SQR

item.title: Field - sqw
item.description: Number of successfully completed synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SQW

item.title: Field - src
item.description: Return code from SMS interface (SSOB RC) Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SRC

item.title: Field - srd
item.description: if set: self desc. Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Description device Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dts.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL

item.title: Field - srs
item.description: Reason code from SMS interface (SSOB RS) Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SRS

item.title: Field - ssc
item.description: START SUBCHANNEL (SSCH) COUNT Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SSC

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74SSI

item.title: Field - sta
item.description: =1 at interval end online or offline devices indicated to be monitored Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - stor
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read timeout conditions (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74STOR

item.title: Field - stow
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write timeout conditions (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74STOW

item.title: Field - sts
item.description: On = model dependent data not available by STSCH Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field enf.

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74STY

item.title: Field - sub
item.description: UCB DEV TYPE CODE IN RIGHT BYTE Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SUB

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN

item.title: Field - tdt
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yy Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TDT

item.title: Field - tdy
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yyyy Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TDY

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - tnm
item.description: IODF Name Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TNM

item.title: Field - tok
item.description: Configuration token Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TOK

item.title: Field - tot
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS IN ALL RECORDS FOR THIS LOGICAL DEVICE CLASS RECORD Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TOT

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74TRN

item.title: Field - tsf
item.description: Suffix of IODF Name Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TSF

item.title: Field - tsr
item.description: Number of small records written during interval Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TSR

item.title: Field - ttm
item.description: IODF creation time hh.mm.ss Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TTM

item.title: Field - typ
item.description: UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP FIELD Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74TYP

item.title: Field - utl
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES WHEN THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED, BUT AN SSCH HAD NOT BEEN ISSUED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74UTL

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vac
item.description: DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM

item.title: Field - xpv
item.description: =1 Device in SuperPAV mode Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cn2.
